item.title: So close.. Almost PERFECT DX
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

primadude:

It cannot find the method ‘BannedUsers(String)’ in Player.java.

Nope i added public int banned; right where i added my public int muted; in my player.java… and im still getting the same thing… here is my player.java,

package Bulby.players;

import java.net.Socket;
import Bulby.Engine;
import Bulby.io.Frames;
import Bulby.net.PlayerSocket;
import Bulby.util.Stream;
import Bulby.util.Misc;
import Bulby.npcs.NPC;
import Bulby.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists;
import Bulby.players.items.PlayerWeapon;
import Bulby.players.combat.PlayerCombat;
import Bulby.io.packets.Prayer;
import Bulby.io.packets.NPCOption1;
import Bulby.Skills.;
import java.util.;
import java.lang.;
import Bulby.content.;

public class Player {
public int muted; <<----- MUTED
public int banned; <---- [[Banned?? I do anything wrong?]]
/**
* Starter System Integer
*/
public int started = 0;
public void fmwalk(int x, int y) {
int firstX = x - (mapRegionX - 6) * 8;
int firstY = y - (mapRegionY - 6) * 8;
Engine.playerMovement.resetWalkingQueue(this);
Engine.playerMovement.addStepToWalkingQueue(firstX-1, firstY, this);

item.title: So close.. Almost PERFECT DX
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

This server is 508

Hello, im using Bulby’s source and i have almost PERFECTED the ban command for it… So close… all i get is this error…

If you help me when i release it i will give you 20% credits…

Here is my error…

.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:517: cannot find sy
symbol : method BannedUsers(java.lang.String)
location: class Bulby.players.Player
p2.BannedUsers(person);
^

Help? DX

**EDIT: This is my code…

if(cmd[0].equals(“banuser”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“brian”)) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" “) + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.disconnected[0] = true;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You have just Banned " + p2.username+”.”);
p2.BannedUsers(person); <— ((((Main problem))))
p2.frames.showInterface(p2, 999999999);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
p.updateReq = true;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}

I have tried these combinations but nothing worked… :

p2.appenedBannedUsers(person);
p2.appenedToBannedUsers(person);
p2.ToBannedUsers(person);
p2.appenedToBanned(person);
p2.ToBanned(person);

Read full topic
